additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Keep out of reach of children. For advice contact a Poisons Information Centre (phone Australia 13 11 26 or New Zealand 0800 764 766) or a doctor. If swallowed, DO NOT induce vomiting. If skin or hair contact occurs, remove contaminated clothing and flush skin and hair with running water. If in eyes wash out immediately with a large amount of water Contact a doctor if irritation persists. Stains like rust, bleach damage and dried paint, ink or dyes may be impossible to remove. Vanish NapiSan contains an oxygen-based bleaching agent, it does not contain chlorine bleach.
